attributes.action: Reduce the 4x4 Gas Guzzling Tax to a reasonable rate for people that have eligible purposes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Require 4x4's to tow horse trailers, car trailers etc to enable us to carry on with our sports/hobbies/work.  If you put keep the rate as was announced in this years budget it will be impossible for us to get about.  The people that should be penalised for this are people that do not require them ie for shopping or people that live in london.  They are not harmful to the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
